languages.text: Вы оставляете часть команды добывать адамантиум для протектората фон Валанциус. Те, кого жребий обошел стороной, горячо молятся за жизни друзей и родных, надеясь однажды встретить их вновь — живыми и невредимыми.

traits.locale_text: Вы оставляете часть команды добывать адамантиум для торговой империи фон Валанциус. Те, кого жребий обошел стороной, горячо молятся за жизни друзей и родных, надеясь однажды встретить их вновь — живыми и невредимыми.

languages.text: You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantine for the von Valancius protectorate. Those fortunate to escape such a fate fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they be reunited someday.
languages.original_text: Вы оставляете часть команды добывать адамантиум для протектората фон Валанциус. Те, кого жребий обошел стороной, горячо молятся за жизни друзей и родных, надеясь однажды встретить их вновь — живыми и невредимыми.

traits.locale_text: You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantium for the von Valancius trade empire. Those who pulled the long straws fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they reunite someday.

You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantium for the von Valancius trade empire. Those who pulled the long straws fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they reunite someday.

You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantium for the von Valancius protectorate. Those fortunate to escape such a fate fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they be reunited someday.

You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantine for the von Valancius protectorate. Those fortunate to escape such a fate fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they be reunited someday.

You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantine for the von Valancius protectorate. Those fortunate to escape such a fate fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they be reunited someday.

languages.text: 你在这颗行星上留下了部分船员，为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝提取精金。那些有幸未被选中的船员衷心地为那些被留下之人的家人与朋友祈祷，祈祷他们身体无恙，未来能重新与家人团聚。
languages.original_text: You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantine for the von Valancius protectorate. Those fortunate to escape such a fate fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they be reunited someday.

traits.locale_text: 你在这颗行星上留下了部分船员，为冯·瓦兰修斯王朝提取精金。那些有幸未被选中的船员衷心地为那些被留下之人的家人与朋友祈祷，祈祷他们身体无恙，未来能重新与家人团聚。

languages.text: あなたはフォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家のために、アダマンチウムを抽出するため、クルーの一部を残すことにした。幸運にもこのような運命を免れた者たちは、いつか再会できる日が来ることを信じ、友人や家族の無事を祈っている。
languages.original_text: You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantine for the von Valancius protectorate. Those fortunate to escape such a fate fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they be reunited someday.

traits.locale_text: あなたはフォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家のために、アダマンチウムを抽出するため、クルーの一部を残すことにした。幸運にもこのような運命を免れた者たちは、いつか再会できる日が来ることを信じ、友人や家族の無事を祈っている。

languages.text: Dejas a una parte de la tripulación para extraer adamantino para el protectorado von Valancius. Los afortunados que escapan a tal destino rezan fervientemente por las vidas de sus amigos y familiares, con la esperanza de encontrarlos en buen estado de salud si algún día vuelven a reunirse.
languages.original_text: You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantine for the von Valancius protectorate. Those fortunate to escape such a fate fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they be reunited someday.

traits.locale_text: Dejas a una parte de la tripulación para extraer adamantio para el protectorado von Valancius. Los afortunados que escapan a tal destino rezan fervientemente por la vida de sus amigos y familiares, con la esperanza de encontrarlos en buen estado de salud si algún día vuelven a reunirse.

languages.text: Du lässt einen Teil der Crew zurück, um für das Protektorat von Valancius Adamantium zu extrahieren. Die glücklichen Crewmitglieder, die diesem Schicksal entgehen, beten inbrünstig für ihre Freunde und Verwandten und hoffen, sie bei guter Gesundheit vorzufinden, sollten sie sich je wiedersehen.
languages.original_text: You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantium for the von Valancius protectorate. Those fortunate to escape such a fate fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they be reunited someday.

traits.locale_text: Du lässt einen Teil der Crew zurück, um für das Protektorat von Valancius Adamantium zu extrahieren. Die glücklichen Crewmitglieder, die diesem Schicksal entgehen, beten inbrünstig für ihre Freunde und Verwandten und hoffen, sie bei guter Gesundheit vorzufinden, sollten sie sich je wiedersehen.

languages.text: Vous laissez sur place une partie de votre équipage chargée d'extraire de l'adamantine pour le protectorat von Valancius. Les privilégiés qui ont eu la chance d'échapper à ce sort peu enviable prient ardemment pour les vies de leurs proches et amis, espérant malgré tout les trouver en bonne santé s'ils sont un jour appelés à se revoir.
languages.original_text: You leave a part of the crew to extract adamantine for the von Valancius protectorate. Those fortunate to escape such a fate fervently pray for the lives of their friends and family, hoping to find them in good health should they be reunited someday.

Les privilégiés qui ont eu la chance d'échapper à ce sort peu enviable prient ardemment pour les vies de leurs proches et amis, espérant malgré tout les trouver en bonne santé s'ils sont un jour appelés à se revoir.
